Uses of Class
org.openliberty.openaz.azapi.constants.PepResponseBehavior

Packages that use PepResponseBehavior
org.openliberty.openaz.azapi.constants The purpose of this package is to provide constants and Enums that can be used by the other packages in the project. 
org.openliberty.openaz.azapi.pep The goal of this "PepApi interface package" is to provide a set of interfaces that provide a framework that will simplify the creation of Policy Enforcement Points (PEPs) that use an underlying authorization provider that is accessed through the "AzApi" package. 
org.openliberty.openaz.pep This package is the OpenAz reference "implementation" of the OpenAz "PepApi interface package", and therefore generally contains implementation classes and only implementation-specific interfaces, also included is a PepApi tutorial that describes the approach to building a PepApi implementation for a specific authorization provider, as well as a 2nd Mapper tutorial that describes the overall approach to writing mappers. 
 

Uses of PepResponseBehavior in org.openliberty.openaz.azapi.constants
 

Methods in org.openliberty.openaz.azapi.constants that return PepResponseBehavior

static PepResponseBehavior[] PepResponseBehavior.values()
          Returns an array containing the constants of this enum type, in the order they are declared.
 

Uses of PepResponseBehavior in org.openliberty.openaz.azapi.pep
 

Methods in org.openliberty.openaz.azapi.pep that return PepResponseBehavior
 PepResponseBehavior PepResponseFactory.getMissingAttributeBehavior()
          Get the PepResponseBehavior that has been set to be applied when an indeterminate due to missing attributes is returned.
 PepResponseBehavior PepResponseFactory.getNotApplicableBehavior()
          Get the PepResponseBehavior that has been set to be applied when not-applicable response is returned.
 PepResponseBehavior PepResponseFactory.getProcessingErrorBehavior()
          Get the PepResponseBehavior that has been set to be applied when an indeterminate due to processing error is returned.
 PepResponseBehavior PepResponseFactory.getSyntaxErrorBehavior()
          Get the PepResponseBehavior that has been set to be applied when an indeterminate due to syntax error is returned.
 

Methods in org.openliberty.openaz.azapi.pep with parameters of type PepResponseBehavior
 void PepResponseFactory.setMissingAttributeBehavior(PepResponseBehavior missingAttributeBehavior)
          Set the behavior to one of those described in PepResponseBehavior when an (@link AzStatusCode#AZ_MISSING_ATTRIBUTE} decision is returned from the underlying AzApi implementation.
 void PepResponseFactory.setNotApplicableBehavior(PepResponseBehavior notApplicableBehavior)
          Set the behavior to one of those described in PepResponseBehavior when an AzDecision.AZ_NOTAPPLICABLE decision is returned from the underlying AzApi implementation.
 void PepResponseFactory.setProcessingErrorBehavior(PepResponseBehavior processingErrorBehavior)
          Set the behavior to one of those described in PepResponseBehavior when an (@link AzStatusCode#AZ_PROCESSING_ERROR} decision is returned from the underlying AzApi implementation.
 void PepResponseFactory.setSyntaxErrorBehavior(PepResponseBehavior syntaxErrorBehavior)
          Set the behavior to one of those described in PepResponseBehavior when an (@link AzStatusCode#AZ_SYNTAX_ERROR} decision is returned from the underlying AzApi implementation.

Methods in org.openliberty.openaz.pep with parameters of type PepResponseBehavior
 void PepResponseFactoryImpl.setMissingAttributeBehavior(PepResponseBehavior missingAttributeBehavior)
          Set the behavior to one of those described in PepResponseBehavior when an Indeterminate decision with a MissingAttribute status code is returned from the underlying AzApi implementation.
 void PepResponseFactoryImpl.setNotApplicableBehavior(PepResponseBehavior notApplicableBehavior)
          Set the behavior to one of those described in PepResponseBehavior when a NotApplicable decision is returned from the underlying AzApi implementation.
 void PepResponseFactoryImpl.setProcessingErrorBehavior(PepResponseBehavior processingErrorBehavior)
          Set the behavior to one of those described in PepResponseBehavior when an Indeterminate decision with a ProcessingError status code is returned from the underlying AzApi implementation.
 void PepResponseFactoryImpl.setSyntaxErrorBehavior(PepResponseBehavior syntaxErrorBehavior)
          Set the behavior to one of those described in PepResponseBehavior when an Indeterminate decision with a SyntaxError status code is returned from the underlying AzApi implementation.
